short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost Your Clinical Documentation Productivity with the All-in-One AI Assistant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your clinical documentation with all-in-one assistance—including generative AI, voice commands, and more.



Medha X for Chrome offers real-time solutions to help medical professionals streamline their documentation workflows, no matter what EHR or RIS system they’re using.



With comprehensive tools for generating high-quality clinical documents from notes and pointers, Medha X is more than just a documentation assistant. It’s a tool that helps you enhance productivity, ensure accuracy, and create detailed reports effortlessly. Medha X’s generative AI capabilities enable you to transform your inputs into comprehensive documents and interact hands-free using voice commands, making it an indispensable tool in any clinical setting.



➤ Terms and Conditions

By installing the extension, you agree to and acknowledge: 

[Terms and Conditions URL - https://www.narayanahealth.org/terms-of-use] 

[Privacy Policy URL - https://www.narayanahealth.org/privacy-policy]



➤ How it works Medha X integrates seamlessly with your workflow without needing any complex setup. Log in through a secure company network, configure the URLs and fields, and Medha X will be ready to assist you. When you visit these URLs, an icon will appear, giving you access to Medha X features. You can use report templates, input observations, and have them seamlessly incorporated by AI. The review mode provides feedback based on predefined guidelines to ensure your reports meet the highest standards.



➤ Go beyond documentation Medha X’s advanced AI capabilities go beyond basic documentation tools. It can detect and incorporate detailed clinical observations, ensuring your reports are thorough and accurate. The voice mode feature allows for hands-free interaction, making it easy to use in any busy clinical environment. Additionally, Medha X offers a review mode to ensure your reports comply with clinical guidelines, enhancing both quality and reliability.



➤ What’s included?

The free version of Medha X includes essential features designed to enhance your documentation process. 

• Secure login

• Easy to use configuration process to setup the URL and areas on the page where the extension will work 

• Real-time AI document generation 

• Voice command functionality 

• Comprehensive review mode with detailed feedback 

• Additional customization options for doctors to define the review guidelines for the review of their reports



➤ Works where you work Medha X is designed to work seamlessly in your browser, across various EHR and RIS systems without the need for integration. Use it effortlessly wherever you do your most important documentation.
